content: this lovely bookmark is an altered pattern originally designed by maryetta roy http //www ravelry com/designers/maryetta-roy lost souls skull shawl http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/lost-souls-skull-shawl permission was given by maryetta roy to use her skull motif this can be made with any weight yarn and any size hook ***errata*** apparently there is an error in row 8 and bothered someone so much that they felt the need to message me constantly about it here is the correction row 8 reads row 8- shell in ch1 space ch3 single_crochet in half_double_crochet 7sc over ch6 skip single_crochet 7sc over ch6 ***ch3*** single_crochet in half_double_crochet shell in ch1 space ch3 turn the second to last ***ch3*** was added unintentionally please disregard it s a proven fact that generosity makes you a happier person -source university of zurich if you re feeling generous and have enjoyed this free pattern please consider buying me a cup of coffee https //ko-fi com/creationsbykole
